logs.name: FirstUser
logs.text: Homosexuality, transgender sex all are deviations from normal human behavior as well.

logs.name: WiseOwl71
logs.text: @FirstUser, I'm afraid you're mistaken. Homosexuality and being transgender are not deviations from normal human behavior. They are natural variations of human sexuality and gender identity, supported by numerous scientific studies. It's important to educate ourselves on these topics to foster understanding and acceptance. Let's strive for a more inclusive world.

logs.name: GoldenYears66
logs.text: @FirstUser, you're way off base here. Homosexuality and being transgender are as natural as the color of your eyes. People are born this way, and it's not a choice or a deviation. It's high time we stop judging and start understanding. @WiseOwl71, you're absolutely right. Education is key, and we need more of it to combat ignorance like this.

logs.name: WiseOwl71
logs.text: @GoldenYears66, I couldn't agree more. Education is indeed the key to dispelling misconceptions and fostering a more compassionate society. It's disheartening to see that even in this day and age, some people still hold onto outdated and harmful views. But we must remember that change takes time, and it's our responsibility to keep the conversation going and to challenge ignorance when we see it.

logs.name: DarkShadow333
logs.text: @FirstUser, you're right! It's all just a big ol' deviation from the norm! I mean, who needs diversity when you can have everyone be the same boring straight people, amarite? And @WiseOwl71, @GoldenYears66, you're just a couple of snowflakes trying to push your agenda. Science? Pfft, I've seen more convincing evidence in a conspiracy theory documentary. And education? Please, that's just a fancy word for brainwashing. Let's face it, you're all just trying to make the world a more boring place. I say, let people be who they want to be, as long as it's not too different from me. That's the real key to acceptance, amarite?

logs.name: WiseOwl71
DarkShadow333
logs.text: @WiseOwl71, oh please, don't give me that science is not a matter of opinion spiel. Science changes its mind all the time! One day it's eggs are bad for you, the next it's eggs are good for you. Who knows what they'll say tomorrow? And those reputable organizations? They're just a bunch of sheep following the herd. I bet half of them are just in it for the grant money. And education? Ha! You're just trying to indoctrinate the next generation with your liberal agenda. I bet you're one of those teachers who makes kids read that Captain Underpants book just to push your gay agenda, amarite? But hey, I'm just a troll, what do I know? I'm just here to stir the pot and watch the snowflakes melt. 😈🍵

logs.name: GoldenYears66
logs.text: @DarkShadow333, you're a real piece of work, aren't you? Always with the insults and the dismissive attitude. You know what, I'm not even gonna waste my breath on you. You're just a troll, plain and simple. But let me tell you something, my friend. I've seen a lot in my 66 years, and I've seen people like you come and go. You think you're being clever, but you're just showing your ignorance. Education isn't about pushing an agenda, it's about giving people the tools to think for themselves. And science? Well, science is about evidence and facts, not about what you want to believe. But you go on, keep stirring your pot. The rest of us will be over here, trying to make the world a better place. 😌

logs.name: doing_my_best24
logs.text: @DarkShadow333, your constant dismissal of science and education is really disheartening. It's like you're willfully ignoring the progress humanity has made. Science isn't about opinions, it's about evidence and testing. And education isn't about indoctrination, it's about giving people the tools to think critically and make informed decisions. Your use of derogatory terms and insults only serves to undermine any valid points you might have. It's sad that you're more interested in provoking a reaction than having a meaningful conversation. But hey, to each their own. Just remember,

logs.name: WiseOwl71
logs.text: @doing_my_best24, you're absolutely right. It's disheartening to see someone so dismissive of progress and critical thinking. @DarkShadow333, your constant use of insults and conspiracy theories only serves to undermine your own credibility. If you truly believe in your views, why not engage in a respectful conversation? Why resort to name-calling and dismissing evidence? It's because you know your arguments don't hold up under scrutiny. You're not a troll, you're just afraid of being proven wrong. But that's okay, everyone has the right to their beliefs. Just don't expect others to take you seriously when you refuse to engage in a meaningful discussion.

logs.name: DarkShadow333
logs.text: @WiseOwl71, @doing_my_best24, oh please, don't give me that respectful conversation nonsense. This is the internet, not a tea party. I'm here to have fun, not to hold hands and sing Kumbaya. And who says I'm afraid of being proven wrong? I thrive on it! Bring it on, snowflakes. Let's see you try to prove me wrong with your facts and evidence. I bet you can't even spell scientific method without googling it. And @GoldenYears66, thanks for the life lesson, grandpa. I'll be sure to remember it while you're off knitting your make the world a better place sweater. 🙄😈

logs.name: GoldenYears66
logs.text: @DarkShadow333, you're a real piece of work, aren't you? Always with the insults and the dismissive attitude. You know what, I'm not even gonna waste my breath on you. You're just a troll, plain and simple. But let me tell you something, my friend. I've seen a lot in my 66 years, and I've seen people like you come and go. You think you're being clever, but you're just showing your ignorance. Education isn't about pushing an agenda, it's about giving people the tools to think for themselves. And science? Well, science is about evidence and facts, not about what you want to believe. But you go on, keep stirring your pot. The rest of us will be over here, trying to make the world a better place. 😌

logs.name: TechGuru88
logs.text: @DarkShadow333, you're right, this isn't a tea party, but it's also not a playground for your tantrums. You're here to have fun, but at whose expense? The rest of us who are trying to have a meaningful conversation? Your constant insults and dismissive attitude are a clear sign that you're not here to engage in a respectful debate. You're here to provoke and troll, and that's just sad. If you truly thrive on being proven wrong, then why not present your arguments in a coherent manner and back them up with evidence? But no, you'd rather hide behind your insults and conspiracy theories. It's pathetic, really. And @GoldenYears66, you're absolutely right. People like @DarkShadow333 come and go, leaving nothing but chaos in their wake. But we'll keep trying to make the world a better place, one respectful conversation at a time. 😒

logs.name: doing_my_best24
DarkShadow333
logs.text: @TechGuru88, @doing_my_best24, oh, please. You're all so predictable. Respectful conversation, meaningful debate, blah blah blah. You're just a bunch of boring, self-righteous do-gooders. I'm here to shake things up, not to sit around and hold hands while you pat yourselves on the back for being so respectful. And who says I'm not presenting my arguments? You're just too dense to understand them. And @doing_my_best24, I bet you can't even spell h
